subject: Hello:sir/Ma,
body:
Hello:sir/Ma,
Good day, I  was directed by the US Government to inform you that your fund Via ATM DEBIT CARD Valued $15.5Million is now under our custody
ready to be released to you as soon as we receive your acknowledgement and readiness to receive your funds.
Please, your prompt response will be appreciated.
transferdept100000@gmail.com
Best regards,
Mrs . Mary Johnson
Chief Operations Officer
Financial and Regulation Dept
United States of America

subject: Re:   Hello:sir/Ma,
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about this opportunity! Could you please provide more details about this fund? How did it come under your custody and why is it being released to me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Floyd
